summary: Beautiful two story stone manor located just east of Solitude Sawmill. Quiet, secluded location with splendid views of the harbour and Blue Palace.  Custom interactive display storage and furniture throughout.  Features all crafting amenities.  Expansion Includes additional interactive displays.
descriptionHtml:
Dragon Point Manor Expansion - still requires all DLC

Adds display places for Daedric artifacts, Honorary Thane Weapons and Dragonborn Claws and Masks.  Also adds some much 

needed storage by the forge and a few more containers in the armoury.

This upgrade includes a bug fix for the mask wall and a few requested additions. There is now an open bookcase in the 

library to display books.  The previous bookcase has been moved to the bottom of the stairs leading to the attic. 

The armoury has been slightly enlarged and now includes display areas for the honorary hold weapons.  There were a 

couple of containers added and pre-existing containers may have been moved, but not deleted or replaced.  Contents 

should be safe.  

There is an additional room for the Daedric quest items.  Several of them are weapons, so the display is a standard 

weapon rack.  Time to test your Daedric artifact knowledge. :)  There are item specific storage displays for things that 

were not weapons.  There is also space for both in the event there is a choice of reward items.  If you want to complete 

your collection, here are the codes for all Daedric artifacts:

Artifact		Code	
Masque of Clavicus Vile	000d2846	
The Rueful Axe	0001c4e6
Sanguine Rose	0001cb36		
Ebony Mail		00052794		
Skeleton Key	0003a070		
Oghma Infinium	0001A332		
Savior\'s Hide	0002ac61	
Ring of Hircine	0002ac60
Mehrune\'s Razor	000240d2		
Azura\'s Star		00063b27	
The Black Star	00063b29
Dawnbreaker	0004e4ee		
Volendrung		0002acd2		
Mace of Molag Bal	000233e3		
Wabbajack		0002ac6f		
Spellbreaker	00045f96		
Ring of Namira	0002c37b		
Ebony Blade	0004a38f		
Skull of Coruption	00035066		

For those of us who might need the hint, to use the codes, open a command prompt using the tilde key (~) usually beside 

the 1 key.  Type in the following and press enter.  Use the tilde to exit the command prompt.

player.additem ###### 1

Some meshes have been cleaned and optimized.  Should help with the load.  

Please endorse if you like it.  It encourages me to move forward with additional content.

***************************** 
Original Listing

Beautiful two story stone manor located just east of Solitude Sawmill. Quiet, secluded location with splendid views of the harbour and Blue Palace.  Custom interactive display storage and furniture throughout.  Features all crafting amenities.

Notes and Features:

This does require all DLC.

Custom book shelves for journals and smaller size books.  

Cold storage for meats and dairy.  Check everything.  Things like crates and desks that are not normally storage containers have  been made so.

Celler with additional food storage and Enchanting workbenches.

Library, dining room, three bedrooms with custom furnishings throughout.

Attic with alchemy workbench.  (If you don\'t want to steal the Golden Claw back from Lucan to complete your display plaques, there is one hidden in the corner with the artifacts.)

Quick acccess to the Armoury from the north side of the house lets you drop off things without having to go through the house.  The door is under the patio and behind the stable.  Includes 7 mannequins and several storage containers, as well as some raw materials.

Open air forge with smelter and workbenches.

Add the Spouses Can Live Everywhere mod (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11370) to use this as a base home.  Thank you to Amgepo and Emma who created this. 

Chayification made a really cool video.  Check it out http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sf0_Lp3hZzo &feature=youtu.be

Special note:  if you are using body replacement mods, it will impact Sheogorath and Sanguine.  One person actually had them show up wearing only their underwear!

Please remember to endorse if you like it.
author: Psylvermon
